Many years back there was discussion on the internet about how the film 
po=
ssibly contained a cameo of Rurouni Kenshin in the animated feature 
Millen=
ium Actress.  Essentially someone saw a red headress in the Boshin 
War pai=
nting (it's an exact copy of a famous ukiyo-e) and they thought it 
was the=
 manga/anime character.  It's an honest mistake (^_^) still 
perhaps floati=
ng on a fan messageboard.

I still encourage people who have exhausted the =
live-action Shinsengumi 
films to rent this film---now available widely in =
vid stores across the USA.

-----------------------------------------------=
-------------------------
Posted on (http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/mess=
age/1941)
December 2004 by secretarytocapt3

> ***MILLENIUM ACTRESS*** (con=
tains Shinsengumi cameo AND the 
2nd disk of the dvd
> shows a Shinsengumi =
cosplayer they used as a model AND starring RK 
> Saitou's voice actor Hiro=
aki Suzuoki AND animates Boshin War art).
> 
> ***MILLENIUM ACTRESS*** basi=
cally takes you on a tour of Japanese 
> history via film...and plenty of i=
nside jokes for people who love 
> chambara....film made me cry...

Recentl=
y I had to thank someone for finding me a rare work of music so I 
had to e=
xtract the entire OST of M.A. as a trade---and I wanted to share it 
here a=
s well.

Basic info:
Imdb: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0291350/
Trailer: ht=
tp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DvpGrD5wUzKE
Much better trailer from Japan: =
http://www.youtube.com/watch?
v=3D0uRjP_LqJcY

Millenium Actress is a film =
.. about films, namely the golden era of 
Japanese cinema paralleled with t=
he history of Japan from ancient to 
modern times (including wars).  The ar=
t and writing of this work is top 
notch.  If you watch the film and keep i=
n mind that Chiyoko the main 
character -is- Japan you get a very good inte=
rpretation because her 
maturity during various periods in history is very =
fascinating.

Almost all tracks are instrumental with a bit of vocals.  How=
ever the last 
song is entirely in Japanese and you can preview it here:  
=
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3D5E5PmsPwf0E

the rest of the OST has a ver=
y interesting spiritual, adventure and 
technology mix to it (because the t=
racks are based on the movies the main 
character, an actress, performs in)=
.

Enjoy! 
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3DAW79BRS4
(buy) http://tinyurl.com=
/5u4y5j  (don't buy the fake CDs on Ebay get it 
from Japan---the CD comes =

ites as their
